name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> Receiver
description: Use this to send a request for an item from the A&M dimensional transfer system.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> Transmitter
description: Use this to send away an item to the A&M dimensional transfer system in exchange for points.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> Point
description: This device allows you to see how much currency you've accumulated for use with the A&M dimensional transfer system.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> Packaging System
description: This is a packaging system for use with the A&M dimensional transfer system. It can be used to compress raw material into a single package which can be sent to the AMTS in exchange for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (logs x3)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (scrap metal x30)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (rags x30)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (logs x6)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (scrap metal x60)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: [AMTS] Compressed Matter Package (rags x60)
description: An A&M compressed matter package ready for dimensional transfer. It can be exchanged for points.

name: Cute High Capacity UPS
description: A UPS by A&M that stores more charge with less weight than standard UPS modules.

name: Cute Portable Kitchen
description: A&M manufactured portable cooking set. There are supposedly very few of these made due to the extrordinary costs, a direct consequence of using A&M's proprietary advanced alloy in its construction.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS] </color>Eve Scout Rifle
description: An advanced prototype rifle. Has both semi-automatic and two-round burst firing modes.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> EVE Scout Rifle .308 Magazine
description: Exlusively for use with the AMTS Eve Scout Rifle. It holds 20 rounds.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> A&M Employee's Manual Tier 1 (About Packaging)
description: A manual for Alice & Maria employees. It explains how to pack items for use with the AMTS packaging system.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> A&M Employee's Manual Tier 2 (About Efficient Packaging)
description: A manual for Alice & Maria employees. It explains how to effiently pack items for use with the AMTS packaging system.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> A&M Employee's Manual Tier 3 (About Gear Packaging)
description: A manual for Alice & Maria employees. It explains how to pack gear for use with the AMTS packaging system.

name: <color_pink>[AMTS]</color> A&M Employee's Manual Tier Kawaii (About Kawaii Packaging)
description: A manual for Alice & Maria employees. It explains how to pack kawaii items for use with the AMTS packaging system.
